mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from (select div_no as divNo, project_no as projectNo, comment_content as commentContent, comment_date as commentDate, comment_no as commentNo from comment_tbl order where member_no=#{memberNo} by comment_no desc)c) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select (*) from
comment_tbl
like_tbl
qna_tbl
order_tbl
where member_no=#{memberNo}
